title: Philips AT621 Shaver For Men
review: Not many feature like the other shavers but overall a good shaver. Fully waterproof and close cut blades give the ultimate shaving experience. I am happy with the product and I recommend it to buyers.

title: Too good

title: awesome product
review:
got delivered within two days thanx to flipkart..
used the product its pretty awesome. 
Pros-
1 within budget.
2 save time
3 close cut shave
4 easy to handle
5 pop op trimmer. so no need to buy trimmer
6 nice look 
7 extend warranty up to 3 year through online registration 
Now come to cons of the product..
1 need lot of time to charge(10 hours) but its not a big deal..
2 last the main problem is while using trimmer, shaver is also running.. so its awkward and battery consuming.
 overall a good deal . you may go for it..

title: Slightly disappointed
review:
Never got used to shaving with this after constant effort of 6 months. Finally gave up and switched to a Gillette Fusion. 
Doesn't work well at tough corners/edges and leaves small hair behind all over the place. Far from a clean shave. You need to still do a round with a normal razor to remove all the tiny bits left behind. If you try too hard, it will bruise the skin. It pulls at hair which causes pain. Takes ages to charge. Cleaning is also a headache. Would not recommend to anyone. 
The only reason I haven't disposed it off is that it can still be used as a half good trimmer.

title: Good shaver

title: Average performance
review: I am using this shaver since 6 months....if it is 2 or 3 days bear it will shave perfect.n if hair is long then comes problem...it will leave some hair at many points n again u have to use trimmer to cut those hair.....people with big or medium bear never buy this.

title: Get Clean Shave without any scar.
review: A perfect and precise product. I use is every alternate day to get a clean shave look. And it takes less than 10 mins. Can use easily with out worrying and cuts or bruises like in case of razors.

title: Abhijit dev mondal
review:
Have you used this product?
It's always better to review a product you have personally experienced.

Educate your readers
Provide a relevant, unbiased overview of the product. Readers are interested in the pros and the cons of the product.

Be yourself, be informative
Let your personality shine through, but it's equally important to provide facts to back up your opinion.

Get your facts right!
Nothing is worse than inaccurate information. If you're not really sure, research always helps.

Stay concise
Be creative but also remember to stay on topic. A catchy title will always get attention!

Easy to read, easy on the eyes
A quick edit and spell check will work wonders for your credibility. Also, break reviews into small, digestible paragraphs.

title: Unable to use this product

title: Best shaver ever with very fast shipping.
review:
very nice priduct.Only prob is to charge 10hr for 30min working.
Best shaver ever with very fast shipping.

title: A product worth its price.
review:
The shaver is extremely convenient to use. It glides smoothly on the face though you need an intial amount of practise to use it. The best way to use it is in the wet option with the use of a good quality shaving cream, soap or gel. the only drawback is that the shaver runs for 30 mins and requires 10 hours to charge it to its full capacity. But it also gives you the freedom from expensive cartridges. The safety manual needs to be read properly before use.I bought this product at an unbelievable price of 1499 during an offer period.
Quick delivery and awesome service from flipkart. Keep it up.

title: Does an effective job.
review:
Bought this on a one day offer @ Rs 1499 on flipkart. 

Pros 
1) The product does an effective job and works very well with shaving foam / gel. 
2) Battery is good and charge stays for 8 - 10 shaves.
3) Easy to clean.
4) Gives a quick shave.
5) Overtime you'll notice better skin texture because it cuts the beard instead of scraping the skin. 

Cons
1) Initially it has the tendency to give nasty rashes, but once you get the correct shaving technique its alright. 3 - 4 shaves and its easy to get the hang of it.
2) Tends to miss spots if you're in a hurry. Need to keep a razor handy to take care of small patches / strands of hair.

Overall its a worth buy.

Mitul Patel

title: Brilliant Product!!!!
review: Best and economical way to shave clean.Additional trimmer on the side comes always handy.Not a single knicks and cuts.Good battery backup.!!

title: Good Shaver .. Low battery performance !!
review:
I bought this product for 1700 on Flipkart. The order was delivered 2-3 days before the actual delivery date. Very happy with the speed of delivery and performance of the product.

Pros
- Close cut & Irritation free shaving. For a person like me who has a sensitive skin even to a shaving brush, this shaver actually impressed me. 
- Gives a very close & neat finish with almost zero irritation (with Foam).
- Pop-up trimmer is handy. Very useful for those tricky areas.

Cons
-  Low battery performance. Lasts only 30-40 mins for one full charge
- Cannot shave when connected to charger.
- Grip even though Phillips claim is ergonomic, is not as comfortable. A person with a small palm might find it difficult to hold for longtime.

title: good product of Philips.
review: Its a owsome product of Philips with double benifit of shaver and trimmer. Clean shave and good battery life. Overall very satishfied with this purchase.

title: Phillips & Flipkart at their best!!!
review:
Bought the product in a 50% off from flipkart! Thanks for that awesome deal! 
And the product is so awesome. Shave made so ease. And the product is completly water proof. Like to rate this more than 5 stars. Again special thanks to flipkart for such a wonderfull offer for this worth product!

title: Nice and Easy
review:
Well, after using this product for 9 months, I am satisfied, yes. It cleans off all the hair completely and in no time. Moreover, it makes your skin baby soft.
Using it is easy as stated in the title, cleaning is a bit tiresome and time consuming.
I haven't used it with shaving foam or similar stuff but as far as the results of the dry shave goes, I am sure that the wet one would be equally satisfactory.
Trimmer is awesome. I mean amazing. Not just the build quality but the wonders it does.....best trimmer i've ever used. And it's battery....OMG!! you charge it overnight, and it gives you 3 times worth of shaving time (I don't have much beard and it also depends on your usage).

If you are looking for a good shaver that lasts you for years and does not degrade its value with time much, look no more. Your search is finally over. Go for it and i'm sure that you will not be disappointed.

title: good shaver flipkart is awesome
review: This one is also not giving clean shave near the neck. and the pop up it super idea. Quality of the product is awesome. Good grip. offer price is awesome i buy for 1600 it is super awesome shaver.but overall i suggest go for it...shipping was fast....
